title: Taj Grill
typeOfFood: Lacto, Indian, Buffet, Delivery, Take-out, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Menu has a vegetable dishes section where vegan options are noted. Let your server know, and s/he will bring vegan bread for starters instead of the regular naan. Lunch buffet typically includes 4 or vegan mains and 2 vegan salad dressings. Kitchen rests from 3-5pm. Quiet atmosphere.
